donate: This project is open source and I do it in my spare time. Donating will not enable any extra features. It is simply an ideal way to say thank you for the work behind a project like this. If you wish to do so, [click here](https://donate.dgongut.com). Thank you very much â¤ï¸
empty_schedule: There are no stored schedules. Usage: /schedule CRON run/stop/restart container /schedule CRON mute minutes Example: /schedule 0 1 * * * start micontainer /schedule 30 4 * * * mute 5 If you are not familiar with CRON statements, here you have a website to generate it following the standard.
error_adding_schedule: âŒ It appears that the instruction entered does not follow the correct format. Entered: $1 Usage: /schedule CRON run/stop/restart container Example: /schedule 0 1 * * * start micontainer /schedule 30 4 * * * mute 5 If you are not familiar with CRON statements, here you have a website to generate it following the standard.
error_bot_check_updates: The CHECK_UPDATES variable tells the program whether or not it will perform a check for updates, the possible values are 1 or 0. 1 is active, 0 is disabled.
error_bot_check_updates_interval: The CHECK_UPDATE_EVERY_HOURS variable tells the program how many hours it should check for updates. By default it is 4 hours.
error_bot_container_name: Container name needs to be set in the CONTAINER_NAME variable
error_bot_extended_messages: The variable EXTENDED_MESSAGES tells the program whether or not it will show more information messages than normal, the possible values are 1 or 0. 1 is active, 0 is disabled.
error_bot_telegram_admin: You need to configure the chatId of the user who will interact with the bot with the TELEGRAM_ADMIN variable
error_bot_telegram_admin_anonymous: You cannot be anonymous to control the bot. In the variable TELEGRAM_ADMIN you have to put your user id.
error_bot_telegram_thread: The variable TELEGRAM_THREAD is the thread within a supergroup, it is a numeric value. It has been set to $1.
error_bot_token: You need to configure the bot token with the TELEGRAM_TOKEN variable
error_checking_label_with_error: Could not check label $1 of container $2. Error: [$3]
error_creating_new_container_with_error: Error creating and/or running the new container. The container information is: [$1]
error_deleting_container: âŒ Failed to delete container *$1*. See bot logs for more information.
error_deleting_from_file_with_error: Failed to delete the line from file. Error: [$1]
error_getting_tags: âŒ Could not get tags from *$1*. Repository not supported at this time.
error_monitor_daemon: An error occurred in the event daemon. Relaunching... Error: [$1]
error_multiple_admin_only_with_group: Multiple administrators can only be specified if used in a group (using the TELEGRAM_GROUP variable)
error_prune_containers: âŒ An error occurred deleting unused containers. See the bot logs for more information.
error_prune_containers_with_error: An error has occurred deleting unused containers. Error: [$1]
error_prune_images: âŒ An error occurred deleting unused images. See bot logs for more information.

error_prune_volumes: âŒ An error has occurred deleting unused volumes. See the bot logs for more information.

menu:
*ğŸ«¡ Docker Controller Bot at your service*

Available commands:

 Â· /list Complete list of containers.
 Â· /run Starts a container.
 Â· /stop Stops a container.
 Â· /restart Restarts a container.
 Â· /delete Delete a container.
 Â· /checkupdate Update a container.
 Â· /changetag Change container tag. âš ï¸
 Â· /logs Shows the last logs of a container.
 Â· /logfile Shows the last logs of a container in file format.
 Â· /schedule Scheduling module.
 Â· /compose Extracts the docker-compose from a container. âš ï¸
 Â· /prune Clean up unused objects on the system. âš ï¸
 Â· /mute <min> Mute notifications.
 Â· /info Displays information about a container.
 Â· /version Displays the current version.
 Â· /donate Donate to the developer

âš ï¸ This function is in _experimental_ phase.
menu_logfile: Shows the complete logs of a container in file format
menu_logs: Shows the latest logs of a container
menu_prune:
Prune allows you to remove unused objects from the system. 

Please select the type of object to prune.

user_not_admin:
âŒ This bot does not belong to you.

If you want to control your docker containers via telegram deploy me on your server.

Take a look at [DockerHub](https://hub.docker.com /r/dgongut/docker-controller-bot) where you will find a docker-compose. 

Are you curious? The code is published on [GitHub](https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller- bot).

If you have questions, ask me, I'm @dgongut

If you find any bugs or suggestions, contact me.
